tatas yasmin eva kāle vibhāgāt samyoga vināśaḥ tasmin eva kāle dvi tvam utpadyate samyoga vināśāt dravya vināśaḥ sāmānya buddheḥ ca utpattiḥ

tatas yasmin eva kāle sāmānya jñānāt apekṣā buddheḥ vināśaḥ tasmin eva kāle āśraya vināśāt dvi tva vināśa iti śobhanam etat vidhānam badhya ghātaka pakṣe saha anavasthāna lakṣaṇe tu virodhe dravya jñāna anutpatti prasaṅgaḥ
katham
guṇa buddhi sama kālam apekṣā buddhi vināśāt dvi tva vināśe tad apekṣasya dve dravye iti dravya jñānasya anutpatti prasaṅgaḥ iti
laiṅgika vat jñāna mātrāt iti cetasyāt matam yathābhūtam bhūtasya iti atra liṅga abhāve pi jñāna mātrāt anumānam tathā guṇa vināśe pi guṇa buddhi mātrāt dravya pratyayaḥ syāt iti
na viśeṣya jñāna tvāt
na hi viśeṣya jñānam sārūpyāt viśeṣaṇa sambandham antareṇa bhavitum arhati
tathā ca āha sūtrakāraḥ samavāyinaḥ śvaityāt śvaitya buddheḥ śvete buddhiḥ te kārya kāraṇa bhūte iti
natu laiṅgikam jñānam abhedena utpadyate tasmāt viṣamaḥ yam upanyāsaḥ na āśu utpatteḥ yathā śabda vat ākāśam iti atra trīṇi jñānāni āśu utpadyante tathā dvi tva ādi jñana utpattau iti adoṣaḥ
badhya ghātaka pakṣe pi samānaḥ doṣaḥ eti ced syāt matam
nanu badhya ghātaka pakṣe pi tarhi dravya jñāna anutpatti prasaṅgaḥ
katham
dvi tva sāmānya buddhi sama kālam saṃskārāt apekṣā buddhi vināśāt iti na
samūha jñānasya saṃskāra hetu tvāt
jñāna yaugapadya prasaṅgaḥ iti ced syāt matam nanu jñānānām badhya ghātaka virodhe jñāna yaugapadya prasaṅgaḥ iti na
a vinaśyatoḥ avasthāna pratiṣedhāt
jñāna ayaugapdya vacanena jñānayoḥ yugapad utpattiḥ avinaśyatoḥ ca yugapad avasthānam pratiṣidhyate na hi badhya ghātaka virodhe jñānayoḥ yugapad utpattiḥ vinaśyatoḥ ca yugapad avasthānam asti iti
tat caturvidham aṇu mahat dīrgham hrasvam ca iti
tatra mahat dvividham nityam anityam ca
nityam ākāśa kāla diś ātma su parama mahat tvam anityam tryaṇuka ādau eva
tathā ca aṇu api dvividham nityam anityam ca
nityam paramāṇu manaḥ su tad pārimāṇḍaluyam
anityam dvyaṇukaḥ eva
kuvalaya āmalaka bilva ādiṣu mahatsu api tad prakarṣa bhāva abhāvam apekṣya bhākta uṇu tva vyavahāraḥ
dīrgha tva hrasva tve ca utpādye mahat aṇu tva eka artha samavete
sam it ikṣu vaṃśa ādiṣu aṃjasā a dīrgheṣu api tad prakarṣa bhāva abhāvam apekṣya bhāktaḥ hrasva tva vyavahāraḥ
anityam caturvidham api saṃkhyā parimāṇa pracaya yoni
tatra īśvara buddhim apekṣya utpannā paramāṇu dvyaṇuka iṣu bahu tva saṃkhyātaiḥ ārabdhe kārya dravye tryaṇuka ādi lakṣaṇe rūpa ādi utpatti samakālam mahat tvam dīrgha tvamcakaroti
dvi bahubhiḥ mahadbhiḥ ca ārabdhe kārya dravye kāraṇa mahā tvāni eva mahā tvam ārabhante na bahu tvam
samāna saṃkhyaiḥ ca ārabdha itiśaya darśanāt
pracaya tūla piṇḍayoḥ vartamānaḥ piṇḍa ārambhaka avayava praśithila samyoga an apekṣamāṇa etaretara piṇḍa avayava samyoga apekṣā uvā dvi tūlake mahattvam ārabhate na bahu tva mahattvāni
samāna saṃkhyā pala parimāṇaiḥ ārabdha itiśaya darśanāt
dvi tva saṃkhyā cāṇvoḥ vartamānāt vyaṇuka iṇu tvam ārabhate
mahat tvavat tryaṇuka ādau kāraṇa bahu tva mahat tva samāna jātīya pracayebhyaḥ dīrgha tvasya upattiḥ
aṇu tva vat dvyaṇuke dvi tva saṃkhyātaḥ hrasva tvasya utpattiḥ
atha tryaṇuka ādiṣu vartamānayoḥ mahat tva dīrgha tvayoḥ parsparataḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ dvyaṇukeṣu ca aṇu tva hrasva tvayoḥ iti
tatra asti mahat tva dīrgha tvayoḥ parasparataḥ viśeṣa
mahatsu dīrgham ānīyatām dīrgheṣu ca mahat ānīyatām iti viśiṣṭa vyavahāra darśanāt iti
aṇu tva hrasva tvayoḥ tu parasparataḥ viśeṣaḥ tad darśinām pratyakṣaḥ eti
tat caturvidham api parimāṇam utpādyam āśraya vināśāt eva vinaśyati iti
pṛthaktvam apoddhāra vyavahāra kāraṇam
tat punar eka dravyam aneka dravyam ca
tasya tu nitya anitya tva niṣpattayaḥ saṃkhyayā a vyākhyātāḥ
etāvān tu viśeṣaḥ eka tva ādi vat ekapṛthaktva ādiṣu apara sāmānya abhāvaḥ saṃkhyayā tu viśiṣyate tad viśiṣṭa vyavahāra darśanāt iti
samyogaḥ samyukta pratyaya nimittam
saca dravya guṇa karma hetuḥ
dravya ārambhe nirapekṣaḥ tathā bhavati iti sāpekṣebhyaḥ nirapekṣebhyaḥ ca iti vacanāt
guṇa karma ārambha ītu sāpekṣaḥ samyukta samavāyāt agneḥ vaiśeṣikam iti vacanāt
atha kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ katividhaḥ ca iti
aprāptayoḥ prāptiḥsamyogaḥ saca trividhaḥ anyatara karma jaḥ ubhaya karma jaḥ samyoga jaḥ ca
tatra anyatara karma jaḥ kriyāvatā a niṣkriyasya
yathā sthāṇoḥ śyena id na vibhū nāmca mūrttaiḥ
ubhaya karma jaḥ uviruddha diś kriyayoḥ sannipātaḥ
yathā mallayoḥ meṣa ayoḥ vā
samyoga jaḥ tu utpanna mātrasya cira utpannasya vā a niṣkriyasya kāraṇa samyogibhiḥ akāraṇaiḥ kāraṇa akāraṇa samyoga pūrvakaḥ kārya akārya gataḥ samyogaḥ
sa ca ekasmāt dvābhyām bahubhyaḥ ca bhavati
ekasmāt tāvat tantu vīraṇa samyogāt dvi tantuka vīraṇa samyogaḥ
dvābhyām tantu ākāśa samyogābhyām ekaḥ dvi tantuka ākāśa samyogaḥ
bahubhyaḥ ca tantturī samyogebhyaḥ ekaḥ paṭa turī samyogaḥ
ekasmāt ca dvayoḥ utpattiḥ
katham
yadā pārthiva āpyayoḥ aṇvoḥ samyoge sati anyena pārthivena pārthivasya anyena apyena ca apyasya yugapad samyogau bhavataḥ tadā tābhyām samyogābhyām pārhtiva āpye dvyaṇuke yugapad ārabhyete
tatas yasmin kāle dvyaṇukayoḥ kāraṇa guṇa pūrva krameṇa rūpa ādi utpattiḥ tasmin eva kāle itaretara kāraṇa akāraṇa gatāt samyogāt itaretara kāya akārya gatau samyogau yugapad utpadyete
kimkāraṇam
kāraṇa sāyoginā hi akāraṇena kāryam avaśyam samyujyate iti nyāyaḥ atas pārthivam dvyaṇukam kāraṇa samyoginā apyena aṇunā sambaddhyate āpyam api dvyaṇukam kāraṇ samyoginā pārthivena iti
atha dvyaṇukayoḥ itaretara kāraṇa akāraṇa sambaddhayoḥ katham parasparataḥ sambandhaḥ eti
tayoḥ api samyoga jābhyām samyogābhyām sambandhaḥ eti
na asti ajaḥ samyogaḥ nitya parimaṇḍala vat pṛthak anabhidhānāt
yathā caturvidham parimāṇam utpādyam uktvā āha nityam parimaṇḍalam iti evam anyatara karma ja ādi samyogam utpādyam uktvā pṛthak nityam brūyāt na tu evam abravīt tasmāt na asti ajaḥ samyogaḥ
paramāṇubhiḥ ākāśa ādīnām pradeśa vṛttiḥ anyatara karma jaḥ samyogaḥ
vibhūnām tu parasparataḥ samyogaḥ ūna asti yuta siddhi abhāvāt
sā punar dvayoḥ anyatarasya vā apṛthak gatimat tvam pṛthak āśraya āśrayi tvam ca iti
vināśaḥ tu sarvasya samyogasya eka artha samavetāt vibhāgāt

yadā tantvoḥ samyoge sati anyatara tantu ārambhake aṃśau karma utpadyate tena karmaṇā aṃśu antatarāt vibhāgaḥ kriyate vibhāgāt ca tantu ārambhaka samyoga vināśaḥ samyoga vināśāt tantu vināśaḥ tad vināśe tad āśritasya tantu antara samyogasya vināśaḥ iti
vibhāgaḥ a vibhakta pratyaya nimittam
śabda vibhāga hetuḥ ca
prāpti pūrvikā aprāptiḥ vibhāgaḥ
saca trividhaḥ
anyatara karma jaḥ aubhaya karma jaḥ vibhāga jaḥ ca vibhāgaḥ eti
tatra anyatara karma ja ubhaya karma jau samyoga vat
vibhāga jaḥ tu dvividhaḥ kāraṇa vibhāgāt kāraṇa akāraṇa vibhāgāt ca

tatra kāraṇa vibhāgāt tāvat kārya āviṣṭe kāraṇe karma utpannam yadā tasya avayava antarāt vibhāgam karoti na tat ākāśa ādi deśā yadātu ākāśa ādi deśāt vibhāgam karoti na tadā avayava antarāt iti sthitiḥ

atas vayava karma avayava antarāt eva vibhāgamārabhate tatas vibhāgāt ca dravya ārambhaka samyoga vināśaḥ tasmin vinaṣṭe kāraṇa abhāvāt kārya abhāvaḥ iti avayavi vināśaḥ tadā kāraṇayoḥ vartamānaḥ vibhāgaḥ kārya vināśa viśiṣṭam kālam svatantram vā avayavam apekṣya sa kriyasya eva avayavasya kārya samyuktāt ākāśa ādi deśāt vibhāgamārabhatena niṣkriyasya kāraṇa abhāvāt uttara samyoga anutpattau anupabhogya tva prasaṅgaḥ na tu tad avayava
kāraṇa akāraṇa vibhāgāt api katham

yadā ahaste karma utpannam avayava antarāt vibhāgamakurvat ākāśa ādi deśebhyaḥ vibhāgān ārabhya pradeśa antare samyogān ārabhate tadā ate kāraṇa akāraṇa vibhāgāḥ karma yām diśam prati kārya ārambha abhimukham tām apekṣya kārya akārya vibhāgān ārabhante tad anantaram kāraṇa akāraṇa samyogāt ca kārya akārya samyogān iti
yadi kāraṇa vibhāga anantaram kārya vibhāga utpattiḥ kāraṇa samyoga anantaram kārya samyoga utpattiḥ nanu evam avayava avayavinoḥ yuta siddhi doṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti na
yuta siddhi aparijñānāt
sā punar dvayoḥ anyatarasya vā apṛthak gatimat tvam iyat tu nityānām anityānām tu yuta iṣu āśraya iṣu samavāyaḥ yuta siddhiḥ iti
tvac indriya śarīrayoḥ pṛthak gatimat tvam na asti yuteṣu āśrayeṣu samavāyaḥ usti iti paraspareṇa samyogaḥ siddhaḥ
aṇu ākāśayoḥ tu āśraya antara abhāve pi anyatarasya pṛthak gatimat tvāt samyoga vibhāgau siddhau
tantu paṭayoḥ anityayoḥ āśraya antara abhāvāt parasparataḥ samyoga vibhāga abhāva eti
diś ādīnām tu pṛthak gatimat tva abhāvāt iti paraspareṇa samyoga vibhāga abhāva iti
vināśaḥ tu sarvasya vibhāgasya kṣaṇika tvāt uttara samyoga avadhi sadbhāvāt kṣaṇikaḥ eti
na tu samyoga vidyayoḥ eva vibhāgaḥ tayoḥ eva samyogāt vināśaḥ bhavati kasmāt samyukta pratyaya vat vibhakta pratyaya anuvṛtti abhāvāt tasmāt uttara samyoga avadhi sadbhāvāt kṣaṇikaḥ eti
kvacid ca āśraya vināśāt eva vinaśyati iti katham

yadā dvitantuka kāraṇa avayave aṃśau karma utpannam aṃśu antarāt vibhāgām ārabhate tadā eva tantu antare pi karma utpadyate vibhāgāt ca tantu ārambhaka samyoga vināśaḥ tantu karmaṇā tantu antarāt vibhāgaḥ kriyate iti ekaḥ kālaḥ
tatas yasmin eva kāle vibhāgāt tantu samyoga vināśaḥ tasmin eva kāle samyoga vināśāt tantu vināśaḥ tasmin vinaṣṭe tad āśritasya tantu antara vibhāgasya vināśaḥ iti
evam tarhi uttara vibhāga anutpatti prasaṅgaḥ
kāraṇa vibhāga abhāvāt
tatas pradeśa antara samyogavati samyoga abhāvaḥ eti atas virodhi guṇa asambhavāt karmaṇaḥ cira kāla avasthāyi tvam nitya dravya samavetasya ca nitya tvam iti doṣaḥ katham

yadā api a dvyaṇuka ārambhaka paramāṇau karma utpannam aṇu antarāt vibhāgam karoti tadā eva aṇu antarāt pi karma tatas yasmin eva kāle vibhāgāt dravya ārambhaka samyoga vināśaḥ tadā eva aṇu antara karmaṇāt vyaṇuka aṇvoḥ vibhāgaḥ kriyate tatas yasmin eva kāle vibhāgāt dvi uaṇuka aṇu samyogasya vināśaḥ tasmin eva kāle samyoga vināśāt dvyaṇukasya vināśaḥ
tasmin vinaṣṭe tad āśritasya dvyaṇuka aṇu vibhāgasya vināśaḥ tatas ca virodhi guṇa asambhavāt nitya dravya samaveta karmaṇaḥ nitya tvam iti
tantu aṃśu antara vibhāgāt vibhāgaḥ eti adoṣaḥ

āśraya vināśāt tantvoḥ eva vibhāgaḥ vinaṣṭaḥ ūna tantu aṃśu antara vibhāgaḥ eti etasmāt uttaraḥ vibhāgaḥ jāyate aṅguli ākāśa vibhāgāt śarīra ākāśa vibhāga vat tasmin eva kāle karma samyogam kṛtvā vinaśyati iti adoṣaḥ

athavā aṃśu antara vibhāga utpatti sama kālam tasmin eva tantau karma utpadyate tatas oṃśu antara vibhāgāt tantu ārambhaka samyoga vināśaḥ tantu karmaṇā ca tantu antarāt vibhāgaḥ kriyate iti ekaḥ kālaḥ
tatas samyoga vināśāt tantu vināśaḥ tad vināśāt ca tad āśritayoḥ vibhāga karmaṇoḥ yugapad vināśaḥ
tantu vīraṇayoḥ vā a samyoge sati dravya anutpattau pūrva uktena vidhānena āśraya vināśa samyogābhyām tantu vīraṇa vibhāga vināśāḥ iti
tat tu dvividham dikkṛtam kālakṛtam ca
tatra diś kṛtam diś viśeṣa pratyāyakam
kāla kṛtamca vayaḥ bheda pratyāyakam
tatra diś kṛtasya utpattiḥ abhidhīyate
katham
ekasyām diśi avasthitayoḥ piṇḍayoḥ samyukta samyoga bahu alpa bhāve sati ekasya draṣṭuḥ sannikṛṣṭam avadhim kṛtvā etasmāt viprakṛṣṭaḥ yam iti para tva ādhāre sannikṛṣṭā buddhiḥ utpadyate
tatas tām apekṣya pareṇa diś pradeśena samyogāt para tvasya utpattiḥ
tathā viprakṛṣṭam ca avadhim kṛtvā etasmāt sannikṛṣṭaḥ yam iti apara tva ādhāre itarasmin sannikṛṣṭā buddhiḥ utpadyate
tatas tām apekṣya apareṇa diś pradeśena samyogāt apara tvasya utpattiḥ
kāla kṛtayoḥ api katham
vartamāna kālayoḥ aniyata diś deśa samyuktayoḥ yuva sthavirayoḥ ūḍha śmaśru kārkaśya bali palita ādi sānnidhye sati ekasya draṣṭuḥ yuvānam avadhim kṛtvā sthivire viprakṛṣṭā buddhiḥ utpadyate
tatas tām apekṣya pareṇa kāla pradeśena samyogāt para tvasya utpattiḥ
sthaviram ca avadhim kṛtvā āyūni sannikṛṣṭā buddhiḥ utpadyate
tatas tām apekṣya apareṇa kāla pradeśena samyogāt apara tvasya utpattiḥ iti
vināśaḥ tu apekṣā buddhi samyoga dravya vināśāt

apekṣā buddhi vināśāt tāvat utpanne paratve yasmin kāle sāmānya buddhiḥ utpannā bhavati tata upekṣā buddheḥ vinaśyat tā sāmānya jñāna tad sambandhebhyaḥ paratva guṇa buddheḥ utpadyamāna tā iti ekaḥ kālaḥ
tatas upekṣā buddheḥ vināśaḥ guṇa buddheḥ ca utpattiḥ tatas upekṣā buddhi vināśāt guṇasya vinaśyat tā guṇa jñāna tad sambandhebhyaḥ dravya buddheḥ utpadyamāna tā iti ekaḥ kālaḥ
tatas dravya buddheḥ utpattiḥ guṇasya vināśaḥ eti
samyoga vināśāt api katham
apekṣā buddhi sama kālam eva para tva ādhāre karma utpadyate tena karmaṇā diś piṇḍa vibhāgaḥ kriyate apekṣā buddhitaḥ para tvasya utpattiḥ iti ekaḥ kālaḥ
tatas sāmānya buddhieḥ utpattiḥ diś piṇḍa samyogasya ca vināśaḥ tatas yasmin kāle guṇa buddhiḥ utpadyate tasmin eva kāle diś piṇḍa samyoga vināśāt guṇasya vināśaḥ
dravya vināśāt api katham

paratva ādhāra avayave karma utpannam yasmin eva kāle vayava antarāt vibhāgam karoti tasmin eva kāle pekṣā buddhiḥ utpadyate tatas vibhāgāt yasmin eva kāle samyoga vināśaḥ tasmin eva kāle paratvam utpadyate tatas samyoga vināśāt dravya vināśaḥ tad vināśāt ca tad āśritasya guṇasya vināśaḥ
dravya apekṣā buddhoḥ yugapad vināśāt api katham
yadā apara tva ādhāra avayave karma utpadyate tadā eva apekṣā buddhiḥ utpadyate karmaṇā ca avayava antarāt vibhāgaḥ kriyate para tvasya utpattiḥ iti ekaḥ kālaḥ

tatas yasmin eva kāle vayava vibhāgāt dravya ārambhaka samyoga vināśaḥ tasmin eva kāle sāmānya buddhiḥ utpadyate tad anantaram samyoga vināśāt dravya vināśaḥ sāmānya buddheḥ ca apekṣā buddhi vināśaḥ iti ekaḥ kālaḥ
tatas dravya apekṣā buddhoḥ vināśāt para tvasya vināśaḥ
dravya samyoga vināśāt api katham

yadā aparatva ādhāra avayave karma utpannam avayava antarāt vibhāgam karoti tasmin eva kāle piṇḍa karma apekṣā buddhoḥ yugapad utpattiḥ tatas yasmin eva kāle paratvasya utpattiḥ tasmin eva kāle vibhāgāt dravya ārambhaka samyoga vināśaḥ piṇḍa karmaṇā diś piṇḍasya ca vibhāgaḥ kriyate iti ekaḥ kālaḥ

tatas yasmin eva kāle sāmānya buddhiḥ utpadyate tasmin eva kāle dravya ārambhaka samyoga vināśāt piṇḍa vināśaḥ piṇḍa vināśāt ca piṇḍa samyoga vināśaḥ tatas guṇa buddhi sama kālam piṇḍa diś piṇḍa samyoga vināśāt para tvasya vināśaḥ
samyoga apekṣā buddhoḥ yugapad vināśāt api katham

yadā aparatvam utpadyate tadā aparatva ādhāre karma tatas yasmin eva kāle paratva sāmānya buddhiḥ utpadyate tasmin eva kāle piṇḍa karmaṇā diś piṇḍa vibhāgaḥ kriyate tatas sāmānya buddhi tā upekṣā buddhi vināśaḥ vibhāgāt ca diś piṇḍa samyoga vināśaḥ iti ekaḥ kālaḥ
tatas samyoga apekṣā buddhi vināśāt para tvasya vināśaḥ
trayāṇām samavāyi asamavāyi nimitta kāraṇānām yugapad vināśāt api katham

yadā apekṣā buddhiḥ utpadyate tadā piṇḍa avayave karma tatas yasmin eva kāle karmaṇā avayava antarāt vibhāgaḥ kriyate ipekṣā buddheḥ para tvasya ca utpattiḥ tasmin eva kāle piṇḍe pi karma tatas vayava vibhāgāt piṇḍa ārambhaka samyoga vināśaḥ piṇḍa karmaṇā ca diś piṇḍa vibhāgaḥ kriyate sāmānya buddheḥ ca utpattiḥ iti ekaḥ kālaḥ

tatas samyoga vināśāt piṇḍa vināśaḥ vibhāgāt ca diś piṇḍa samyoga vināśaḥ sāmānya jñānāt apekṣā buddheḥ vināśaḥ eti etat sarvam yugapad trayāṇām samavāyi asamavāyi nimitta kāraṇānām vināśāt para tvasya vināśaḥ iti
buddhiḥ upalabdhiḥ jñānam pratyaya eti paryāyāḥ
sā ca aneka prakāra artha ānantyāt prati artha niyata tvāt ca
tasyāḥ sati api anekavidha tve samāsatas dve vidhā vidyā ca avidyā ca iti
tatra avidyā caturvidha a saṃśaya viparyaya anadhyavasāya svapna lakṣaṇā
saṃśayaḥ tāvat prasiddha aneka viśeṣayoḥ sādṛśya mātra darśanāt ubhaya viśeṣa anusmaraṇāt adharmāt ca kim svid iti ubhaya avalambī vimarṣaḥ saṃśayaḥ
saca dvividhaḥ antar bahis ca
antar tāvatā ādeśikasya samyak mithyā ca uddiśya punar ādiśataḥ triṣu kāleṣu saṃśayaḥ bhavati kinnu samyak mithyā vā iti
bahis dvividhaḥ pratyakṣa viṣaye ca apratyakṣa viṣaye ca
tatra apratyakṣa viṣaya itāvat sādhāraṇa liṅga darśanāt ubhaya viśeṣa anusmaraṇāt adharmāt ca saṃśayaḥ bhavati
yathā aṭavyām viṣāṇa mātra darśanāt gauḥ gavayaḥ vā iti

pratyakṣa aviṣaye pi sthāṇu puruṣayoḥ ūrdhva tā mātra sādūśya darśanāt vakra ādi viśeṣa anupalabdhitaḥ sthāṇu tva ādi sāmānya viśeṣa anabhivyaktau ubhaya viśeṣa anusmaraṇāt ubhayatra ākṛṣyamāṇasya ātmanaḥ pratyayaḥ dolāyate kim nu khalu ayam sthāṇuḥ syāt puruṣaḥ vā iti
viparyayaḥ upi pratyakṣa anumāna viṣayaḥ eva bhavati

pratyakṣa viṣaya itāvat prasiddha aneka viśeṣayoḥ pitta kapha anila upahata indriyasya ayathārtha ālocanāt asannihita viṣaya jñāna ja saṃskāra apekṣāt ātma manasoḥ samyogāt adharmāt ca a tasmin tat iti pratyayaḥ viparyayaḥ
yathā gavyā iva aśvā eti
asati api pratyakṣe pratyakṣa abhimānaḥ bhavati yathā vyapagata ghana paṭalam acala jalanidhi sat ūśambaram aṃjana cūrṇa puṃja śyāam śārvaram tamaḥ eti
anumāna viṣaye pi bāṣpa ādibhiḥ dhūma abhimataiḥ vahi anumāṇam gavaya viṣāṇa darśanāt ca gauḥ iti

trayī darśana viparīteṣu śākya ādi darśaneṣu idam śreyaḥ iti mithyā pratyayaḥ viparyayaḥ śarīra indriya manaḥ sva ātma abhimānaḥ kṛtakeṣu nitya tva darśanam kāraṇa vaikalye kārya utpatti jñānam hitam upadiśat sva hitamiti jñānam ahitam upadiśat su hitamiti jñānam
anadhyavasāyaḥ upi pratyakṣa anumāna viṣayaḥ eva saṃjāyate
tatra pratyakṣa viṣaya itāvat prasiddha artheṣu aprasiddha āryeṣu vā avyāsaṅgāt arhti tvāt vā kim iti ālocana mātram anadhyavasāyaḥ
yathā vāhīkasya panasa ādiṣu anadhyavasāyaḥ bhavati
tatra sattā dravya tva pṛthvī tva vṛkṣa tva rūpavat tva ādi śākhā ādi apekṣā udhyavasāyaḥ bhavati
panasa tvam api panaseṣu anuvṛttam āṃra ādibhyaḥ vyāvṛttam pratyakṣam eva kevalam tu upadeśa abhāvāt viśeṣa saṃjñā pratipattiḥ na bhavati
anumāna viṣaye pi nārikela dvīpa vāsinaḥ sāsnā mātra darśanāt kaḥ nu khalu ayam prāṇī syāt iti anadhyavasāyaḥ bhavati
uparata indriya grāmasya pralīna manaskasya indriya dvāreṇa eva yat anubhavanam mānasam tat svapna jñānam katham

yadā a buddhi pūrvāt ātmanaḥ śarīra vyāpārāt aha nikhinnānām prāṇinām niśi viśrama artham āhāra pariṇāma artham vā adṛṣṭa kārita prayatna apekṣāt ātma antar karaṇa sambandhāt manasi kriyā prabandhāt antar hṛdaye nirindriye ātma pradeśe niścalam manaḥ tiṣṭhati tadā a pralīna manaskaḥ iti ākhyāyate

pralīne ca tasmin uparata indriya grāmaḥ bhavati tasyām avasthāyām prabandhena prāṇa apāna santāna pravṛttau ātma manaḥ samyoga viśeṣāt svāpa ākhyāt saṃskārāt ca indriya dvāreṇa eva asat su viṣayeṣu pratyakṣa ākāram svapna jñānam utpadyate
tat tu trividham
saṃskāra pāṭavāt dhātu doṣāt adṛṣṭāt ca
tatra saṃskāra pāṭavāt tāvat kāmī krudhā uvā yadā ayam artham ādūtaḥ cintayan svapiti tadā sā eva cintā santatiḥ pratyakṣa ākārā saṃjāyate
dhātu doṣāt vāta prakṛtiḥ tad dūṣitaḥ u vā ākāśa gamana ādīn paśyati
pitta prakṛtiḥ pitta dūṣitaḥ u vā agnipraveśa kanaka parvata ādīn paśyati
śleṣma prakṛtiḥ śleṣma dūṣitaḥ uvā sarit samudra prataraṇa hima parvata ādīn paśyati

yat svayam anubhūteṣu an anubhūteṣu vā a prasiddha artheṣu a prasiddha artheṣu vā yat śubha āvedakam gaja ārohaṇa chattra lābhāt itat sarvam sāṃskāra adharmābhyām bhavati viparītam ca taila abhyaṃjana khara uṣṭa ārohaṇāt itat sarvam adharma saṃskārābhyām bhavati
atyanta aprasiddha artheṣu adṛṣṭāt eva iti
svapnāntikam yadi api uparata indriya grāmasya bhavati tathā api atītasya jñāna prabandhasya pratyavekṣaṇāt smṛtiḥ eva iti bhavati eṣā caturividhā avidyā iti
vidyā api caturvidhā
pratyakṣa laiṅgika smṛti ārṣa lakṣaṇā
pratītya yat utpadyate itat pratyakṣam
akṣāṇi indriyāṇi ghrāṇa rasana cakṣuḥ tvac śrotra manāṃsi ṣaḍ
tat hi dravya ādiṣu padārtheṣu utpadyate
dravya itāvat dvividhe mahati aneka dravyavat tva udbhūta rūpa prakāśa catuṣṭaya sannikarṣāt dharma ādi sāmagrye ca sva rūpa ālocana mātram
sāmānya viśeṣa dravya guṇa karma viśeṣaṇa apekṣāt ātma manaḥ sannikarṣāt pratyakṣam utpadyate sat dravyam pṛthivī viṣāṇī śuklaḥ gauḥ gacchati iti
rūpa rasa gandha sparśeṣu aneka dravya samavāyāt svagata viśeṣāt sva āśraya sannikarṣāt niyata indriya nimittam utpadyate
tena eva upalabdhiḥ
saṃkhyā parimāṇa pṛthaktva samyoga vibhāga para tva apara tva sneha drava tva vega karmaṇām pratyakṣa dravya samavāyāt cakṣuḥ sparśanābhyām grahaṇam
buddhi sukha duhkha icchā dveṣa prayatnānām dvayoḥ ātma manasoḥ samyogāt upalabdhiḥ
bhāva dravya tva guṇa tva karma tva ādīnām upalabhya ādhāra samavetānām āśraya grāhakaiḥ indriyaiḥ grahaṇam iti etat asmat ādīnām pratyakṣam

asmat viśiṣṭānām tu yoginām yuktānām yoga ja dharma anugṛhītena manasā sva ātma antara ākāśa diś kāla param aṇu vāyu manasaḥ su tad samaveta guṇa karma sāmānya viśeṣeṣu samavāye ca avitatham sva rūpa darśanam utpadyate
viyuktānām punar catuṣṭaya sannikarṣāt yoga ja dharma anugraha sāmarthayāt sūkṣma vyavahita viprakṛṣṭa iṣu pratyakṣam utpadyate
tatra sāmānya viśeṣeṣu svarūpa ālocana mātram pratyakṣam pramāṇam prameyāḥ dravya ādayaḥ padārthāḥ pramāna ātmā apramitiḥ dravya ādi viṣayam jñānam
sāmānya viśeṣa jñāna utpattau avibhaktam ālocana mātram pratyakṣam pramāṇam asmin na anyat pramāṇa antaram asti aphala rūpa tvāt

athavā sarveṣu padārtheṣu catuṣṭaya sannikarṣāt avitatham a vyapadeśyam yat jñānam utpadyate tat pratyakṣam pramāṇam prameyāḥ dravya ādayaḥ padārthāḥ pramātā ātmā apramitiḥ guṇa doṣa mādhyasthya darśanam iti
liṅga darśanāt saṃjāyamānam laiṅgikam
liṅgam punar
yad anumeyena sambaddham prasiddham ca tad anvite
tad abhāve cana asti eva tat liṅgam anumāpakam
viparītam atas yat syāt ekena dvitayena vā
viruddha asiddha sandigdham aliṅgam kāśyapaḥ bravīt

yat anumeyena arthena deśa viśeṣe kāla viśeṣe iva asahacaritam anumeya dharma anvite ca anyatra sarvasmin eka deśe iva aprasiddham anumeya viparīte ca sarvasmin pramāṇataḥ usa deva tat aprasiddha arthasya anumāpakam liṅgam bhavati iti
vidhiḥ tu yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ agni abhāve dhūmaḥ api na bhavati iti
evam prasiddha samayasya asandigdha dhūma darśanāt sāhacarya anusmaraṇāt tad anantaram agni adhyavasāyaḥ bhavati iti
evam sarvatra deśa kāla a vinābhūtam itarasya liṅgam
śāstre kārya ādi grahaṇam nidarśana artham kṛtam na avadhāraṇa artham kasmāt yūtiḥ eka darśanāt
tat yathā adhvaryuḥ om śrāvayan vyavahitasya hotuḥ liṅgam candra udayaḥ samudravṛddheḥ kumuda vikāśasya ca śaradi jala prasādaḥ ugastya udayasya iti
evamādi tat sarvam asya idam iti sambandha mātra vacanāt siddham
tat tu dvividham
dṛṣṭam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam ca
tatra dṛṣṭam prasiddha sādhyayoḥ atyanta jāti abheda inumānam
yathā gavyā iva sāsnā mātram upalabhya deśa antare pi sāsnā mātra darśanāt gavi pratipattiḥ
prasiddha sādhyayoḥ atyanta jāti bhede liṅga anumeya dharma sāmānya anuvṛttitaḥ unumānam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam
yathā ākarṣaka vaṇi grāja puruṣāṇām ca pravṛtteḥ phalavat tvam upalabhya varṇa āśramiṇām api dṛṣṭam prayojanam an uddiśya pravartamānānām phala anumānam iti
tatra liṅga darśanam pramāṇam pramitiḥ agni jñānam
athavā agni jñānam eva pramāṇam pramitiḥ agnau guṇa doṣa mādhyasthya darśanam iti etat sva niścita artham anumānam
śabda ādīnām api anumāne ntarbhāvaḥ samāna vidhi tvāt
yathā prasiddha samayasya asandigdha liṅga darśana prasiddhi anusmaraṇābhyām atīndriya īrthe bhavati anumānam evam śabda ādibhyaḥ api iti
śruti smṛti lakṣaṇaḥ upi āmnāyaḥ vaktṛ prāmāṇya apekṣaḥ tad vacanāt āmnāya prāmāṇyam liṅgāt ca anityaḥ buddhi pūrvā vākya kṛtiḥ vede buddhi pūrvaḥ dadātiḥ iti ukta tvāt
prasiddha abhinayasya aceṣṭayā apratipatti darśanāt tat api anumānam eva
āptena aprasiddhasya gavayasya gavāgavaya pratipādanāt upamānam āpta vacanam eva
darśana arthāt arthāpattiḥ virodhi eva śravaṇāt anumitānumānam
sambhavaḥ upyavinābhāvi tvāt anumānam eva
abhāvaḥ api anumānam eva yathā utpannam kāryam kāraṇa sadbhāve liṅgam
evam anutpannam kāryam kāraṇa asadbhāve liṅgam
tathā eva aitihyam api avitatham āpta upadeśaḥ eva iti
pañca avayavena vākyena sva niścita artha pratipādanām para artha anumānam
pañca avayavena eva vākyena saṃśayita viparyasta avyutpannānām pareṣām sva niścita artha pratipādanam para artha anumānam vijñeyam
avayavāḥ punar pratijñā apadeśa nidarśana anusandhāna pratyāmnāyāḥ
tatra anumeya uddeśaḥ virodhī pratijñā
pratipipādayiṣita dharma viśiṣṭasya dharmiṇā upadeśa viṣayam āpādayitum uddeśa mātram pratijñā
yathādravyam vāyuḥ iti
avirodhi grahaṇāt pratyakṣa anumāna abhyupagata sva śāstra sva vacana virodhinaḥ nirastāḥ bhavanti

yathā anuṣṇaḥ agniḥ iti pratyakṣa virodhī ghanam ambaram iti anumāna virodhī brāhmaṇena surā peyā iti āgama virodhī vaiśeṣikasya satkāryam iti bruvataḥ sva śāstra virodhī na śabdaḥ ūrtha pratyāyakaḥ eti sva vacana virodhī
liṅga vacanam apadeśaḥ
yat anumeyena sahacaritam tat samāna jātīye sarvatra sāmānyena prasiddham tad viparīte ca sarvasmin asat eva tat liṅgam uktam tasya vacanam apadeśaḥ
yathā kriyāvat tvāt guṇavat tvāt ca tathā ca tad anumeye sti tad samāna jātīye ca sarvasmin guṇavat tvam asārvasmin kriyāvat tvam
ubhayam api etat adravyena asti eva tasmāt tasya vacanam apadeśa eti siddham
etena asiddha viruddha sandigdha anadhyavasita vacanānām anapadeśa tvam uktam bhavati
tatra asiddhaḥ caturvidhaḥ
ubhaya asiddhaḥ anyatara asiddhaḥ tad bhāva asiddhaḥ anumeya asiddhaḥ ca iti
tatra ubhaya asiddhaḥ ubhayoḥ vādi prativādinoḥ asiddhaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ sāvayava tvāt iti
anyatara asiddhaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ kāryatvāt iti
tad bhāva asiddhaḥ yathā dhūma bhāvena agni adhigatau kartavyāyām upanyasyamānaḥ vāṣpe dhūma bhāvena asiddhaḥ eti
anumeya asiddhaḥ yathā pārthivam dravyam tamaḥ kṛṣṇa rūpavat tvāt iti
yaḥ hi anumeye vidyamānaḥ upi tad samāna jātīye sarvasmin ā asti tad viparīte ca asti sa viparīta sādhanāt viruddhaḥ yathā yasmāt viṣāṇī tasmāt aśvaḥ eti
yaḥ tu san anumeya itad samāna asamāna jātīyayoḥ sādhāraṇaḥ san eva sa sandeha janaka tvāt sandigdhaḥ yathā yasmāt viṣāṇī tasmāt gauḥ iti
ekasmin ca dvayoḥ hetvoḥ yathā ukta lakṣaṇayoḥ viruddhayoḥ sannipāte sati saṃśaya darśanāt ayam anyaḥ sandigdhaḥ eti kecid
yathā a mūrta tva amūrta tvam prati manasaḥ kriyāvat tva asparśavat tvayoḥ iti
nanu ayam asādhāraṇaḥ eva acākṣuṣa tva pratyakṣa tva vat saṃhatayoḥ anyatara pakṣa asambhavāt tatas ca anadhyavasitā etvakṣyāmaḥ
nanu śāstre tatra tatra ubhayathā darśanam saṃśaya kāraṇam apadiśyate eti na saṃśayaḥ viṣaya dvaita darśanāt

saṃśaya utpattau viṣaya dvaita darśanam kāraṇam tulya bala tve ca tayoḥ paraspara virodhāt nirṇaya anutpādaka tvam syāt na tu saṃśaya hetutvam na ca tayoḥ tulya balavat tvam asti anyatarasya anumeya uddeśasya āgama bādhita tvāt ayam tu viruddha bhedaḥ eva
yaḥ ca anumeye vidyamānaḥ tad samāna asamāna jātīyayoḥ asannevasaḥ anyatara asiddhaḥ anadhyavasāya hetu tvāt anadhyavasitaḥ yathā asat kāryam utpatteḥ iti
ayam aprasiddhaḥ na apadeśa eti vacanāt avaruddhaḥ
nanu ca ayam viśeṣaḥ saṃśaya hetuḥ abhihitaḥ śāstre tulya jātīyeṣu artha antara bhūteṣu viśeṣasya ubhayathā dṛṣṭa tvāt iti na anya artha tvāt śabde viśeṣa darśanāt

saṃśaya anutpattiḥ iti uktena ayam dravya ādīnām anyatamasya viśeṣaḥ syāt śrāvaṇa tvam kim tu sāmānyam eva sampadyate kasmāt tulya jātīyeṣu artha antara bhūteṣu dravya ādi bhedānām ekaikaśas viśeṣasya ubhayathā dṛṣṭa tvāt iti uktam na saṃśaya kāraṇam anyathā ṣaṭsu api padārtheṣu saṃśaya prasaṅgāt tasmāt sāmānya pratyayāt eva saṃśayaḥ iti
dvividham nidarśanam sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca
tatra anumeya sāmānyena liṅga sāmānyasya anuvidhāna darśanam sādharmya nidarśanam
tat yathā yat kriyāvat tat dravyam dṛṣṭam yathāśarā eti
anumeya viparyaye ca liṅgasya abhāva darśanam vaidharmya nidarśanam
tat yathā yat adravyam tat kriyāvat na bhavati yathā sattā iti
anena nidarśana ābhāsāḥ nirastāḥ bhavanti

tat yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ mūra tvāt yat amūrtam dṛṣṭam tat nityam yathā paramāṇuḥ yathā karma yathā sthālī yathā tamaḥ ambara vat iti yat dravyam tat kriyāvat dṛṣṭam iti ca liṅga anumeya ubhaya āśraya asiddha ananugata viparīta anugatāḥ sādharmya nidarśana ābhāsāḥ

yat anityam tat mūratam dṛṣṭam yathā karma yathā paramāṇuḥ yathā ākāśam yathā tamaḥ ghaṭavatī at niṣkriyam tat adravyam ca iti liṅga anumeya ubhaya avyāvṛtta āśraya asiddha avyāvṛtta viparīta vyāvṛtta avaidharmya nidarśana ābhāsāḥ iti
nidarśana inu meya sāmānyena saha dṛṣṭasya sa liṅga sāmānyasya anumeya inu ānayanam anusandhānam
anumeya dharma ātra tvena abhitam liṅga sāmānyam anupalabdha śaktikam nidarśane sādhya dharma sāmānyena saha dṛṣṭam anumeye yena vacanena anusandhīyate tat anusandhānam
tathā ca vāyuḥ kriyāvān iti
anumeya abhāve ca tasya asattvam
anumeya tvena uddiṣṭe ca aniścite ca pareṣām niścaya āpādana artham pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam prapti āmnāyaḥ
pratipādya tvena uddiṣṭe ca aniścite ca pareṣām hetu ādibhiḥ avayavaiḥ āhita śaktīnām parisamāptena vākyena niścaya āpādana artham pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam pratyāmanāyaḥ
tasmāt dravyam eva iti
nahi etasmin asati pareṣām avayavānām samastānām vyastānām vā tad artha vācaka tvam asti gamyamāna artha tvāt iti ced na atiprasaṅgāt
tathā hi pratijñā anantaram hetu mātra abhidhānam kartavyam viduṣām anvaya vyatireka smaraṇāt tad artha avagatiḥ bhaviṣyati iti tasmāt atra eva artha parisamāptiḥ
katham anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti anena aniścita anitya tva mātra viśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ kathyate prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt iti anena anitya tva sādhana dharma mātram abhidhīyate
iha yat prayatna ānantarīyakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti anena sādhya sāmānyena sādhana sāmānyasya anugām amātram ucyate
nityam aprayatna ānantarīyakam dṛṣṭam yathā ākāśam iti anena sādhya abhāvena sādhanasya asattvam pradarśyate

tathāca prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ śabdaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ na ca tathā ākāśa vat aprayatna ānantarīyakaḥ śabdaḥ iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām dṛṣṭa sāmarthyasya sādhana sāmānyasya śabdena sandhānam gamyate tasmāt anityaḥ śabda iti anena anityaḥ eva śabdaḥ iti pratipipādayiṣita artha parisamāptiḥ gamyate tasmāt pañca avayavena eva vākyena pareṣām sva niścita artha prtipādanam kriyate iti etat parārtha anumānam siddham iti
etat eva pratyakṣam anumānam vā
yad viśeṣa darśanāt saṃśaya virodhi utpadyate sa pratyakṣa nirṇayaḥ

yathā sthāṇu puruṣayoḥ ūrdhva tā mātra sādṛśya ālocanāt viśeṣeṣu apratyakṣeṣu ubhaya viśeṣa anusmaraṇāt kim ayam sthāṇu puruṣaḥ vā iti saṃśaya utpattau śirah pāṇi ādi darśanāt puruṣaḥ eva ayam iti avadhāraṇa jñānam pratyakṣa nirṇayaḥ
viṣāṇa mātra darśanāt gauḥ gavayaḥ vā iti saṃśaya utpattau sāsnā mātra darśanāt gauḥ u eva ayam iti avadhāraṇa jñānam anumāna nirṇayaiḥ iti
ātma manasoḥ samyoga viśeṣāt paṭu ābhyāsa ādara pratyaya janitāt ca saṃskārāt dṛṣṭa śruta anubhūteṣu artheṣu śeṣa anuvyavasāya icchā anusmaraṇa dveṣa hetuḥ atīta viṣayā asmṛtiḥ iti

āmnāya vidhāt ṇām ṛṣīṇām atīta anāgata vartamāneṣu atīndriyeṣu artheṣu dharma ādiṣu grantha upanibaddheṣu anupanibaddheṣu ca ātma manasoḥ samyogāt dharma viśeṣāt ca yat prātibham yathārtha nivedanam jñānam utpadyate tat ārṣam iti ācakṣate
tat tu prastāreṇa devarṣīṇām kadācid devalaukikānām yathā kanyakā bravīti śvas me bhātā āganti hṛdayam me kathayati iti
siddha darśanam na jñāna antaram kasmāt prayatna pūrvakam aṃjana pāda lopa khaḍga gulikā ādi siddhānām dṛśya draṣṭūnām sūkṣma vyavahita viprakṛṣṭeṣu artheṣu yat darśanam tat pratyakṣam eva
atha divya āntarikṣa bhaumānām prāṇinām graha nakṣatra sañvāra ādi nimittam dharma adharma vipāka darśanam iṣṭam tat api anumānam eva
atha liṅga an apekṣam dhrama ādiṣu darśanam iṣṭam tat api pratyakṣa ārṣayoḥ anyatarasmin atas bhūtam iti evam buddhiḥ iti
anugraha lakṣaṇam sukham
sraj ādi abhipreta viṣaya sānnidhye sati iṣṭa upalabdhi indriya artha sannikarṣāt dharma ādi apekṣāt ātma manasoḥ samyogāt anugraha abhiṣvaṅga nayana ādi prasāda janakam utpadyate tat sukham
atīta iṣu viṣaya iṣu smṛti jam
anāgata iṣu saṅkalpa jam
yat tu viduṣām asatu viṣaya anusmaraṇa ichā saṅkalpeṣu āvirbhavati tat vidyā śama santoṣa dharma viśeṣa nimittam iti
upaghāta lakṣaṇam duhkham
viṣa ādi anabhipreta viṣaya sānnidhye sati aniṣṭa upalabdhi indriya artha sannikarṣāt adharma ādi apekṣāt ātma manasoḥ samyogāt yat amarṣa upaghāta dainya nimittam utpadyate tat duhkham
anāgata iṣu saṅkalpa jam iti
svārtham parārtham vā a prapta prārthana icchā
sā ca ātma manasoḥ samyogāt sukha ādi apekṣāt smṛti apekṣāt vā utpadyate
kāmaḥ abhilāṣaḥ rāgaḥ saṅkalpaḥ kāruṇyam vairāgyam upadhā bhāvaḥ iti evamādayaḥ ecchā bhedāḥ
maithuna icchā kāmaḥ
abhyavahāra icchā abhilāṣaḥ
punar punar viṣaya anuraṃjana icchā rāgaḥ
anāsanna kriyā icchā saṅkalpaḥ
sva artham an apekṣya para duhkha prahāṇa icchā kāruṇyam
doṣa darśanāt viṣaya tyāga icchā vairāgyam
para vañvanā icchā upadhā
antar nigūḍha icchā bhāvaḥ
cikīrṣā ajihīrṣā ityādi kriyā bhedāt icchā bhedāḥ bhavanti
prajvalana ātmaka udveṣaḥ
yasmin sati prajvalitam iva ātmānam manyate sa dveṣaḥ
sacā atam manasoḥ samyogāt duhkha apekṣāt smṛti apekṣāt vā utpadyate
krodhaḥ drohaḥ manyuḥ akṣamā amarṣaḥ eti dveṣa bhedāḥ
prayatnaḥ saṃrambha otsāha eti prayāyāḥ
sa dvividhaḥ jīvana pūrvaḥ icchā dveṣa pūrvakaḥ ca
tatra jīvana pūrvakh
suptasya prāṇa apāna santāna prerakaḥ prabodha kāle ca antar karaṇasya indriya antara prāpti hetuḥ
asya jīvana pūrvakasya ātma manasoḥ samyogāt dharma adharma apekṣāt utpattiḥ
itaraḥ tu hita ahita prāpti parhihāra samartha sya vyāpārasya hetuḥ śarīra vidhārakaḥ ca
sacā atam manasoḥ samyogāt icchā apekṣāt dveṣa apekṣāt vā utpadyate
apratyakṣam patana karma anumeyam samyoga prayatna sāṃskāra virodhi
asya ca ap ādi paramāṇu rūpa ādi vat nitya anitya tva niṣpattayaḥ
drava tvam syandana karma kāraṇam
tri dravya vṛtti
tat tu dvividham sāṃsiddhakam naimittikam ca
sāṃsiddhikam apām viśeṣa guṇaḥ
naimittikam pṛthivī tejasoḥ sāmānya guṇaḥ
sāṃsiddhikasya guru tva vat nitya anitya tva niṣpattayaḥ
saṅghāta darśanāt sāṃsiddhikam ayuktam iti ced na
divyena tejasā samyuktānām āpyānām paramāṇūnām parasparam samyogaḥ dravya ārambhakaḥ saṅghāta ākhyaḥ tena paramāṇu drava tva pratibandhāt kārye hi makarakādau drava tva anupattiḥ
naimittikam ca pṛthivī tejasoḥ agni samyoga jam

katham sarpiḥ jatu madhūcchiṣṭa ādīnām kāraṇeṣu paramāṇuṣu agni samyogāt vega apekṣāt karma utpattau tad jebhyaḥ vibhāgebhyaḥ dravya ārambhaka samyoga vināśāt kārya dravya nivṛttau agni samyogāt auṣṇya apekṣāt svatantreṣu paramāṇuṣu drava tvam utpadyate tatas teṣu bhoginām adṛṣṭa apekṣāt ātma aṇu samyogāt karma utpattau tad jebhyaḥ samyogebhyaḥ dyūṇuka ādi prakrameṇa kārya dravyam utpadyate tasmin ca rūpa ādi utpatti sama kāla
sneha upa ām viśeṣa guṇaḥ
saṃgraha mṛjā ādi hetuḥ
asya api guru tva vat nitya anitya tva niṣpattayaḥ
saṃskāraḥ trividhaḥ vegaḥ bhāvanā sthiti sthāpakaḥ ca
tatra vegaḥ mūrtimat su pañva su dravyeṣu nimitta viśeṣa apekṣāt karmaṇaḥ jāyate niyata diś kriyā prabandha hetuḥ sparśavat dravya samyoga viśeṣa virodhī kvacid kāraṇa guṇa pūrva krameṇa utpadyate
bhāvanā saṃjñakaḥ tu ātma guṇaḥ dṛṣṭa śruta anubhūteṣu artha iṣu smṛti pratyabhijñāna hetuḥ bhavati jñāna mada duhkha ādi virodhī
paṭu abhyāsa ādara pratyaya jaḥ paṭu pratyaya apekṣāt ātma manasoḥ samyogāt āścarya irthe paṭuḥ saṃskāra atiśayaḥ jāyate
yathā dākṣiṇātyasya uṣṭra darśanāt iti
vidyā śilpa vyāyāma ādiṣu abhyasyamāneṣu tasmin eva arthe pūrva pūrva saṃskāram apekṣamāṇāt uttara uttarasmāt pratyayāt ātma manasoḥ samyogāt saṃskāra atiśayaḥ jāyate
prayatnena manaḥ cakṣuṣi sthāpayitvā pūrvam artham didūkṣamāṇasya vidyut sampāta darśana vat ādara pratyayaḥ tam apekṣamāṇāt ātma manasoḥ samyogāt saṃskāra atiśayaḥ jāyate
yathā devahradeḥ rājata sauvarṇa padma darśanāt iti
sthiti sthāpakaḥ tu sparśavat dravyeṣu vartamānaḥ ghana avayava sanniveśa viśiṣṭeṣu kāla antara avasthāyiṣu sva āśrayam anyathā kṛtam yathā avasthitam sthāpayati
sthāvara jaṅgama vikāra iṣu dhanuḥ śākhā śṛṅga danta asthi sūtra vastra ādi ṣu bhugna saṃvartita iṣu sthiti sthāpakasya kāryam saṃlakṣyate
nitya anitya tva niṣpattayā usyā api guru tva vat
dharmaḥ puruṣa guṇaḥ
kartuḥ priya hita mokṣa hetuḥ
tasya tu sādhanāni śruti smṛti vihitāni varṇa āśramiṇām sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena avasthitāni dravya guṇa karmāṇi
tatra sāmānya anidharme śraddhā ahiṃsā bhūta hita tvam satya vacanam asteyam braham acaryam anupadhā krodha varjanam abhiṣecanam śici dravya sevanam viśiṣṭa devatā bhaktiḥ upavāsa upramādaḥ ca
brāhmaṇa kṣaciya vaiśyānām ijyā adhyayana dānāni brāhmaṇasya viśiṣṭāni pratigraha adhyāpana yājanāni sva varṇa vihitāḥ ca saṃskārāḥ
kṣatriyasya asamyak prajā pālanam asādhu nigrahaḥ yuddheṣu anivartanam svakīyāḥ ca saṃskārāḥ
vaiśya sya kriyā vikraya kṛṣi paśu pālana ani svakīyāḥ ca saṃskārāḥ
śūdrasya a pūrva varṇa pāratantryam amantrikāḥ ca kriyāḥ
āśramiṇām tu brahmacāriṇaḥ guru kula nivāsinaḥ sva śāstra vihitāni guru śuśrūṣā agni indhana bhaikṣya ācaraṇāni madhu māṃsa divāsvapna aṃjana abhyañajana ādi varjanam ca

vidyāvrata snātakasya kṛtadārasya gṛhasthasya śālīna yāyāvara vṛtti upārjitaiḥ arthaiḥ bhūta manuṣya deva pitṛ brahma ākhyānām pañvānām mahāyajñānam sāyam prātar anuṣṭhānam eka agni vidhānena pākayajña saṃsthānām ca nityānām śaktau vidyamānāyām agnyādheya ādīnām ca haviryajña saṃsthānām agniṣṭoma ādīnām soma yajña saṃsthānām ca
ṛtu antareṣu brahmacaryam apatya utpādanam ca
brahmacāriṇaḥ gṛhasthasya vā grāmāt nirgatasya vana vāsaḥ valkaka ajina keśa śmaśru nakha roma dhāraṇam ca
vanya huta atithi śeṣa bhojana ani vānaprasthasya
trayāṇām anyatamasya śraddhāvataḥ sarva bhūtebhyaḥ nityam abhayam dattvā a sam nyasya svāni karmāṇi yama niyameṣu apramattasya ṣaṣ padārtha prasaṃkhyānāt yoga prasādhanam pravrajitasya iti
dṛṣṭam prayojanam an uddiśya etāni sādhanāni bhāva prasādam ca apekṣya ātma manasoḥ samyogāt dharma utpattiḥ iti
adharmaḥ api ātma guṇaḥ
kartuḥ ahita pratyavāya hetuḥ atīndriya untya duhkha saṃvijñāna virodhī
tasya tu sādhanāni śāstre pratiṣiddhāni dharma sādhana viparītāni hiṃsā anṛta steya ādīni vihita akaraṇam pramādaḥ ca etāni duṣṭa abhisandhim ca apekṣya ātma manasoḥ samyogāt adharmasya utpattiḥ
aviduṣaḥ rāga dveṣavataḥ pravartakāt dharmāt prakṛṣṭāt su alpa adharma sahitāt brahma indra prajāpati pitṛ manuṣya lokeṣu āśaya anurūpaiḥ iṣṭa śarīra indriya viṣaya sukha ādibhiḥ yogaḥ bhavati
tathā aprakṛṣṭāt adharmāt su alpa dharma sahitāt preta tiryagyoni sthāneṣu aniṣṭa śarīra indriya viṣaya duhkhābhiḥ yogaḥ bhavati
evam pravṛtti lakṣaṇāt dharmāt adharma sahitāt deva manuṣya tiryak nārakeṣu punar punar saṃsāra bandhaḥ bhavati

jñāna pūrvakāt tu kṛtāt asaṃkalpita phalāt viśuddhe kule jātasya duhkha vigama upāya jijñāsoḥ ācāryam upasaṅgamya utpanna ṣaṣ padārtha tattva jñānasya ajñāna nivṛttau viraktasya rāga dveṣa ādi abhāvāt tad jayoḥ dharma adharmayoḥ anutpattau pūrva saṅcitayoḥ ca upabhogāt nirodhe santoṣa sukham śarīra paricchedam ca utpadya rāga ādi nivṛttau nivṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ kevalaḥ dharmaḥ paramārtha darśana jam sukham kṛtvā nivartate
tadā anirodhāt nirbījasya ātmanaḥ śarīra ādi nivṛttiḥ punar śarīra ādi anutpattau dagdha indhana anala vat upaśamaḥ mokṣaḥ eti
śabda umbara guṇaḥ śrotra grāhyaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ kārya kāraṇa ubhaya virodhī samyoga vibhāga śabda jaḥ pradeśa vṛttiḥ samāna asamāna jātīya kāraṇaḥ
sa dvividhaḥ varṇa lakṣaṇaḥ dhvani lakṣaṇaḥ ca
tatra akāra ādiḥ varṇa lakṣaṇaḥ śaṅkha ādi nimittaḥ dhvani lakṣaṇaḥ ca

tatra varṇa lakṣaṇasya utpattiḥ ātma manasoḥ samyogāt smṛti apekṣāt varṇa uccāraṇa icchā tad anantaram prayatnaḥ tam apekṣamāṇāt ātma vāyu samyogāt vāyau karma jāyate sa ca ūrdhvam gacchan kaṇṭha ādīn abhihanti tatas sthāna vāyu samyoga apekṣamāṇāt sthāna ākāśa samyogāt varṇa utpattiḥ
avarṇa lakṣaṇaḥ upi bherī daṇḍa samyoga apekṣāt bherī ākāśa samyogāt utpadyate

veṇu parva vibhāgāt veṇu ākāśa vibhāgāt ca śabdāt ca samyoga vibhāga niṣpannāt vīcī santāna vat śabda santānaḥ iti evam ṇ santānena śrotra pradeśam āgatasya grahaṇam śrotra śabdayoḥ gamana āgamana abhāvāt aprāptasya grahaṇam na asti prariśeṣāt santāna siddhiḥ iti
praśasta pāda bhāṣye guṇa padārthaḥ samāptaḥ
utkṣepaṇa ādīnām pañcānām api karma tva sambandhaḥ

eka dravyavat tvam kṣaṇika tvam mūrta dravya vṛtti tvam aguṇavat tvam guru tva drava tva prayatna samyoga ja tvam sva kārya samyoga virodhi tvam samyoga vibhāga nirapekṣa kāraṇa tvam asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam sva para āśraya samaveta kārya ārambhaka tvam samāna jātīya anārambhaka tvam dravya anārambhaka tvam ca pratiniyata jāti yogi tvam
diś viśiṣṭa kārya ārambhaka tvam ca viśeṣaḥ

tatra utkṣepaṇam śarīra avayaveṣu tad sambaddheṣu ca yat ūrdhva bhāgibhiḥ pradeśaiḥ samyoga kāraṇam adhobhāgbhiḥ ca pradeśaiḥ vibhāga kāraṇam karma utpadyate guru tva prayatna samyogebhyaḥ tat utkṣepaṇam
tad viparīta samyoga vibhāga kāraṇam karma apakṣepaṇam
ṛjunā dravyasya agra avayvānām tad deśaiḥ vibhāgaḥ samyogaḥ ca mūla pradeśaiḥ yena karmaṇā avayavī kuṭilaḥ saṃjāyate tat ākuñcanam
tad viprayayeṇa samyoga vibhāga utpattau yena karmaṇā avayavī ṛjuḥ sampadyate tat prasāraṇam
yat aniyata diś pradeśa samyoga vibhāga kāraṇam tat gamanam iti
etat pañcavidham api karma śarīra avayaveṣu tad sambaddheṣu ca sat pratyayam asat pratyayam ca yat anyat tat apratyayam eva teṣu anyeṣu ca tad gamanam iti
karmaṇām jāti pañcaka tvam ayuktam gamana aviśeṣāt
sarvam hi kṣaṇikam karma gamana mātram utpannam sva āśrayasya ūrdhvam adhis tiryak vā api aṇu mātraiḥ pradeśaiḥ samyoga vibhāgāt karoti sarvatra gamana pratyayaḥ tasmāt gamanam eva sarvam iti
na vargaśas pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāvṛtti darśana ati ha utkṣepaṇam paratra apakṣepaṇam iti evamādi sarvatra vargaśas pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāvṛttī dṛṣṭā tad hetuḥ sāmānya viśeṣa bhedaḥ vagamyate
teṣām ud ādi upasarga viśeṣāt pratiniyata diś viśiṣṭa kārya ārambha tvāt upalakṣaṇa bhedaḥ upi siddhaḥ
evam api pañca eva iti avadhāraṇa anupapattiḥ
niṣkrāmaṇa praveśana ādiṣu api vargaśas pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāvṛtti darśanāt
yadi utkṣepaṇa ādiṣu sarvatra vargaśas pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāvṛtti darśanāt jāti bhedaḥ eṣyate evam ca niṣkramaṇa praveśana ādiṣu api
kārya bhedāt teṣu pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāvṛttī iti ced na utkṣepaṇa ādiṣu api kārya bhedāt eva pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāvṛtti prasaṅgaḥ
atha samāne vargaśas pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāvṛtti sadbhāve utkṣepaṇa ādīnām eva jāti bheda ūna niṣkramaṇa ādīnām iti atra viśeṣa hetuḥ asti iti na jāti saṅkara prasaṅgāt
niṣkramaṇa ādīnām jāti bhedāt pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāvṛttau jāti saṅkaraḥ prasajyate
katham dvayoḥ draṣṭroḥ ekasmāt apavarakāt apavaraka antaram gacchataḥ yugapad niṣkramaṇa praveśana pratyayau dṛṣṭau tathā dvāra pradeśe praviśati niṣkrāmati iti ca
yadā tu prati sīra ādi apanītam bhavati tadā na praveśana pratyayaḥ na api niṣkramaṇa pratyayaḥ kintu gamana pratyayaḥ eva bhavati
tathā nālikāyām vaṃśapattra ādau patati bahūnām draṣṭūnām yugapad bhramaṇa patana praveśana pratyaya adṛṣṭā iti jāti saṅkara prasaṅgaḥ
na ca evam utkṣepaṇa ādiṣu pratyaya saṅkaraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt utkṣepaṇa ādīnām eva jāti bhedāt pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāvṛttī niṣkramaṇa ādīnām tu kārya bhedāt iti
katham yugapad prayaya bhedāḥ eti ced
atha matam yathā jāti saṅkaraḥ na asita evam aneka karma samāveśaḥ api na asti iti ekasmin karmaṇi yugapad draṣṭṇām bhramaṇa patana praveśana pratyayāḥ katham bhavanti iti
atra brūmaḥ na avayava avayavinoḥ diś viśiṣṭa samyoga vibhāgānām bhedāt

yaḥ hi draṣṭā avayavānām pārśvatas paryāyeṇa diś pradeśaiḥ samyoga vibhāgān paśyati tasya bhramaṇa pratyayaḥ bhavati yaḥ hi avayavini ūrdhva pradeśaiḥ vibhāgam adhas samyogam ca avekṣate tasya patana pratyayaḥ bhavati
yaḥ punar nālikā antardeśe samyogam bahis deśe ca vibhāgam paśyati tasya praveśana pratyayaḥ bhavati iti siddhaḥ kārya bhedāt niṣkramaṇa ādīnām pratyaya bhedaḥ iti
bhavatu utkṣepaṇa ādīnām jāti bhedāt pratyaya bhedaḥ niṣkramaṇa ādīnām tu kārya bhedāt iti
atha gamana tvam kim karma tva paryāyaḥ āhosvit aparam sāmānyam iti
kutas te saṃśayaḥ
samasteṣu utkṣepaṇa ādiṣu karma pratyaya vat gamana pratyaya aviśeṣāt karma tva paryāyaḥ eti gamyate
yatas tu utkṣepaṇa ādi vat viśeṣa saṃjñayā abhihitam tasmāt aparam sāmānyam syāt iti na
karma tva paryāya tvāt
ātma tva puruṣa tva vat karma tva paryāya eva gamana tvam iti
atha viśeṣa saṃjñayā kimartham gamana grahaṇam kṛtam iti na bhramaṇa ādi avarodha ārtha tvāt
utkṣepaṇa ādi śabdaiḥ anavaruddhānām bhramaṇa patana spandana ādīnām avarodha artham gamana grahaṇam kṛtam iti
anyathā hi yāni eva catvāri viśeṣa saṃjñayā uktāni tāni eva sāmānya viśeṣa saṃjñā viṣayāṇi prasajyeran iti

athavā astu aparam sāmānyam gamana tvam aniyata diś deśa samyoga vibhāga kāraṇeṣu bhramaṇa ādiṣu eva vartate gamana śabdaḥ ca utkṣepaṇa ādiṣu bhāktaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ sva āśraya samyoga vibhāga kartṛ tva sāmānyāt iti

katham cikīrṣiteṣu yajña adhyayana dāna kṛṣi ādiṣu yadā hastam utkṣeptum icchati apakṣeptum vā tadā hastavati ātma pradeśe prayatnaḥ saṃjāyate tam prayatnam guru tvā ca upekṣamāṇāt ātma hasta samyogāt haste karma bhavati hastavat sarva śarīra avayaveṣu pāda ādiṣu śarīre ca iti

tad sambaddheṣu api katham yadā hastena musalam gṛhītvā icchām karoti utkṣipāmi hastena musalam iti tad anantaram prayatnaḥ tam apekṣamaṇāt ātma hasta samyogāt yasmin eva kāle haste utkṣepaṇa karma utpadyate tasmin eva kāle tam eva prayatnam apekṣamāṇāt hasta musala samyogāt musala epi karma iti

tatas dūram utkṣipte musale tad artha icchā nivartate punar api apakṣepaṇa icchā utpadyate tad anataram prayatnaḥ tam apekṣamāṇāt yathā uktāt samyogāt hasta musalayoḥ yugapad apakṣepaṇa karmaṇī bhavataḥ tatas antyena musala karmaṇā ulūkhala musalayoḥ abhighāta ākhyaḥ samyogaḥ kriyate sa samyogaḥ musala gata vegam apekṣamāṇaḥ pratyayam musale utpatana karma karoti
tad karma abhighāta apekṣam musale saṃskāram ārabhate tam apekṣya musala hasta samyoga uprayayam hate pi utpatana karma karoti
yadi api prāktanaḥ saṃskāraḥ vinaṣṭaḥ tathā api musala ulūkhalayoḥ samyogaḥ paṭu karma utpādakaḥ samyoga viśeṣa bhāvāt tasya saṃskāra ārambhe sācivya samarthaḥ bhavati
athavā a prāktanaḥ eva paṭuḥ saṃskāraḥ abhighātāt avinaśyan avasthitaḥ iti

atas saṃskāravati punar saṃskāra ārambhaḥ na asti atas yasmin kāle saṃskāra apekṣāt abhighātāt aprayayam musale utpatana karma tasmin eva kāle tam eva saṃskāram apekṣamāṇāt musala hasta samyogāt apratyayam haste pi utpatana karma iti
katham yadā tomaram hastena gṛhītvā utkṣeptum icchā utpadyate tad anantaram prayatnaḥ tam apekṣamāṇāt yathā uktāt samyoga dvayāt tomara hastayoḥ yugapad ākarṣaṇa karmaṇī bhavataḥ

prasārite ca haste tad ākarṣaṇa arthaḥ prayatnaḥ nivartate tad anantaram tiryak ūrdhva dūram āsannam vā ākṣipāmi iti icchā saṃjāyate tad anantaram tad dnurūpaḥ prayatnaḥ tam apekṣamāṇaḥ tomara hasta samyogaḥ nodana ākhyaḥ tasmāt tomare karṃtopannam nodana apekṣam tasmin saṃskāram ārabhate tatas saṃskāra nodanābhyām tāvat karmāṇi bhavanti yāvat hasta tomara vibhāgaḥ iti tatas vibhāgāt nodane nivṛtte saṃskārāt ūrdhvam tiryak dūram āsanna
tathā yantra mukta iṣu gaman vidhiḥ
katham yaḥ balavān kṛta vyāyāmaḥ vāmena kareṇa dhanuḥ viṣṭabhya dakṣiṇena śaram sandhāya sa śarām jyām muṣṭinā gṛhītvā ākarṣaṇa icchām karoti sa jyeṣu ākarṣayāmi etat dhanuḥ iti

tad anantaram prayatnaḥ tam apekṣamāṇāt ātma hasta samyogāt ākarṣaṇa karma haste yadā eva utpadyate tat aivatam eva prayatnam apekṣamāṇāt hasta jyā śara samyogāt jyāyām śare ca karma prayatna viśiṣṭa hasta jyā śara samyogam apekṣamāṇābhyām jyā koṭi samyogābhyām karmaṇībhavataḥ dhanuṣkoṭyoḥ iti etat sarvam yugapad

evam ākarṇāt ākṛṣṭe dhanuṣi na atas param anena gantavyamiti yat jñānam tatas tad ākarśaṇa arthasya prayatnasya vināśaḥ tatas punar mokṣaṇa icchā saṃjāyate tad anantaram prayatnaḥ tam apekṣamāṇāt ātma aṅguli samyogāt aṅguli karma tasmāt jyā aṅguli vibhāgaḥ tatas vibhāgāt samyoga vināśaḥ tasmin vinaṣṭe pratibandhaka abhāvāt yadā dhaṇuṣi vartamānaḥ sthiti sthāpakaḥ saṃskāraḥ maṇḍalībhūtam dhanuḥ yathā avasthitam sthāpay
tam apekṣamāṇa eṣu jyā samyogaḥ nodanam tasmāt iṣāvādyam karma nodana apekṣam iṣau saṃskāram ārabhate
tasmāt saṃskārāt nodana sahāyāt tāvat karmāṇi bhavanti yāvat iṣu jyā vibhāgaḥ vibhāgāt nivṛtte nodane karmāṇi uttarottarāni iṣu saṃskārāt eva āpatanāt iti
bahūni karmāṇi kramaśas kasmāt samyoga bahu tvāt ekaḥ tu saṃskāraḥ ntarāle karmaṇā upekṣā kāraṇa abhāvāt iti
evam ātma dhiṣṭhita iṣu sat pratyayam asat prayayam ca karma uktam
anadhiṣṭhiteṣu bāhyeṣu caturṣu mahābhūteṣu apratyayam karma gamanam eva nodana ādibhyaḥ bhavati
tatra nodanam guru tva drava tva vega prayatnān samasta vyastān apekṣamāṇaḥ yaḥ samyoga viśeṣaḥ nodanam avibhāga hetoḥ ekasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇam tasmāt caturṣu api mahābhūteṣu karma bhavati
yathā paṅka ākhyāyām pṛthivyām
vega apekṣaḥ yaḥ samyoga viśeṣa avibhāga hetoḥ ekasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇam saḥ abhighātaḥ

tasmāt api caturṣu mahābhūteṣu karma bhavati yathā pāṣāṇa ādiṣu niṣṭhure vastuni abhipatiteṣu tathā pāda ādibhiḥ nudyamānāyām abhihanyamānāyām vā paṅka ākhyāyām pṛthivyām yaḥ samyogaḥ nodana abhighātayoḥ anyatara apekṣa ubhaya apekṣaḥ vāsa samyukta samyogaḥ tasmāt api pṛthivī ādiṣu karma bhavati
ye ca pradeśān an udyante na api abhihanyante teṣu api karma jāyate
pṛthivī udakayoḥ guru tva vidhāraka samyoga prayatna vega abhāve sati guru tvāt yat adhas gamanam tat patanam
yathā musala śarīra ādiṣu uktam
tatra ādyam guru tvāt dvitīya ādīn itu guru tva saṃskārābhyām
srotaḥ bhūtānām apām sthalāt nimna abhisarpaṇam yat tat drava tvāt syandanam
katham samantāt rodha h samyogena avayavi drava tvam pratibaddham avayava drava tvam api ekārtha samavetam tena eva pratibaddham uttara uttara avayava drava tvāni samyukta samyogaiḥ pratibaddhāni

yadā tu mātrayā setu bhedaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati tadā samantāt pratibaddha tvāt avayavi drava tvasya kārya ārambhaḥ na asti setu samīpa sthasya avayava drava tvasya uttarottareṣām avayava drava tvānām pratibandhaka abhāvāt vṛtti lābhaḥ

tatas kramaśas samyuktānām eva abhisarpaṇam tatas pūrva dravya vināśe sati prabandhena avasthitaiḥ avayaviḥ dīrgham dravyam ārabhyate tatra ca kāraṇa guṇa pūrva krameṇa drava tvam utpadyate tatra ca kāraṇānām samyuktānām prabandhena gamane yat avayavi nikarma utpadyate tat syandana ākhyam iti
saṃskārāt karma eṣu ādiṣu uktam
tathā cakra ādiṣu avayavānām pārśvatas pratiniyata diś deśa samyoga vibhāga utpattau yat avayavinaḥ saṃskārāt aniyata diś deśa samyoga vibhāga nimittam karma tat bhramaṇam iti
evamādayaḥ gamana viśeṣāḥ
prāṇa ākhye tu vāyau karma ātma vāyu samyogāt icchā dveṣa pūrvaka prayatna apekṣāt jāgratā ecchā anuvidhāna darśanāt suptasya tu jīvana pūrvaka prayatna apekṣāt
ākāśa kāla diś ātmanām sati api dravya bhāve niṣkriya tvam sāmānya ādi vat amūrta tvāt
mūrtiḥ asarvagata dravya parimāṇam tad anuvidhāyinī ca kriyā sā ākāśa ādiṣu na asti tasmāt na teṣām kriyā sambandhaḥ usti iti
sa vigrahe manasi indriya antara sambandha artham jāgrataḥ karma ātma manaḥ samyogāt icchā dveṣa pūrvaka prayatna apekṣā tanu abhiprāyam indriya antareṇa viṣaya antara upalabdhi darśanāt
suptasya prabodha kāle jīvana pūrvaka prayatna apekṣāt
apasarpaṇa karma utpasarpaṇa karma ca ātma manaḥ samyogāt adṛṣṭa apekṣāt

katham yadā ājīvana sahakārinoḥ dharma adharmayoḥ upabhogāt prakṣayaḥ anyonya abhibhavaḥ vā tadā ājīvana sahāyayoḥ vaikalyāt tad pūrvaka prayatna vaikalyāt prāṇa nirodhe sati anyābhyām labdha vṛttibhyām dharma adharmābhyām ātma manaḥ samyoga sahāyābhyām mṛta śarīrāt vibhāga kāraṇam apasarpaṇa karma utpadyate

tatas śarīrāt vahis apagatam tābhyām eva dharma adharmābhyām samutpanena ātivāhika śarīreṇa sambandhyate tat saṅkrāntam ca svargam narakam vā gatvā āśaya anurūpeṇa śarīreṇa sambadhyate tat samyoga artham karma upasarpaṇam iti
yoginām ca bahis udrecitasya manasaḥ abhipreta deśa gamanam pratyāgamanam ca
tathā sarga kāle pratyagreṇa śarīreṇa sambandha artham karma adṛṣṭa kāritam
evam anyat api mahābhūteṣu yat pratyakṣa anumānābhyām anupalabhyamāna kāraṇam upakāra apakāra samartham ca bhavati tat api adṛṣṭa kāritam
yathā sarga ādau aṇu karma agni vāyvoḥ ūrdhva tiryak gamane mahābhūtānām prakṣebhaṇam
abhiṣiktānām maṇīnām taskaram pratigamanam
ayasaḥ uyaskānta abhisarpaṇam ca iti
iti praśasta pāda bhāṣye karma padārthaḥ samāpataḥ
atha sāmānya padārtha nirūpaṇam
sāmānyam dvividham param aparam ca
sva viṣaya sarva gatam abhinna ātmakam aneka vṛtti eka dvi bahuṣu ātma svarūpa anugama pratyaya kāri svarūpa abhedena ādhāra iṣu prabandhena vartamānam anuvṛtti pratyaya kāraṇam
katham pratipiṇḍam sāmānya apekṣam prabandhena jñāna utpattau abhyāsa pratyaya janitāt ca saṃskārāt atīta jñāna prabandha pratyavekṣaṇāt yat anugatam asti tat sāmānyam iti
tatra sattā sāmmānyam param anuvṛtti pratyaya kāraṇam eva

yathā paraspara viśiṣṭeṣu carma vastra kambala ādiṣu ekasmānila dravya abhisambandhāt nīlam nilam iti pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ tathā paraspara viśiṣṭeṣu dravya guṇa karmasu aviśiṣṭā asat sat iti pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ sā ca artha antarāt bhavitum arhati iti yat tad artha anatarm sā sattā iti siddhā
sattā anusambandhāt sat sat iti pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ tasmāt sā asāmānyam eva
aparam dravya tva guṇa tva karma tva ādi anuvṛtti vyāvṛtti hetu tvāt sāmānyam viśeṣaḥ ca bhavati
tatra dravya tvam paraspara viśiṣṭeṣu pṛthivī ādiṣu anuvṛtti hetu tvāt sāmānyam guṇa karmabhyaḥ vyāvṛtti hetu tvāt viśeṣaḥ
tathā guṇa tvam paraspara viśiṣṭeṣu rūpa ādiṣu anuvṛtti hetu tvāt sāmānyam dravya karmabhyaḥ vyāvṛtti hetu tvāt viśeṣaḥ

tathā karma tvam paraspara viśiṣteṣu utkṣepaṇa ādiṣu anuvṛtti pratyaya hetu tvāt sāmānyam dravya guṇebhyaḥ vyāvṛtti hetu tvāt viśeṣaḥ evam pṛthivī tva rūpa tva utkṣepaṇa tva go tva ghaṭa tva paṭa tva ādīnām api prāṇya prāṇi gatānām anuvṛtti vyāvṛtti hetu tvāt sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ
etāni tu dravya tva ādīni prabhūta viṣaya tvāt prādhānyena sāmānyāni sva āśraya viśeṣaka tvāt bhaktyā viśeṣa ākhyāni iti
lakṣaṇa bhedāt eṣām dravya guṇa karmabhyaḥ padārtha antara tvam siddham
ataeva ca nitya tvam
dravya ādi iṣu vṛtti niyamāt pratyaya bhedāt ca parasparataḥ ca anya tvam
pratyekam sva āśraya iṣu lakṣaṇa aviśeṣāt viśeṣa lakṣaṇa abhāvāt ca ekatvam
yadi api aparicchinna deśāni sāmānyāni bhavanti tathā api upalakṣaṇa niyamāt kāraṇa sāmagrī niyamāt ca sva viṣaya sarva gatāni
antarā āleca samyoga samavāya vṛtti abhāvāt avyapadeśyāni iti
iti praśasta pāda bhāṣye sāmānya padārthaḥ samāptaḥ
atha viśeṣa padārtha nirūpaṇam
anta iṣubhavāḥ antyāḥ sva āśraya viśeṣaka tvāt viśeṣāḥ
vināśa ārambha rahiteṣu nitya dravyeṣu aṇu ākāśa kāla diś ātma manaḥsu pratidravyam ekaikaśas vartamānāḥ atyanta vyāvṛtti buddhi hetavaḥ
yathā asmadīnām gavādiṣu aśva ādibhyaḥ tulya ākṛti guṇa kriyā avayava samyoga nimittā a pratyaya vyāvṛttiḥ dṛṣṭā gauḥ śuklaḥ śīghra gatiḥ pīna kakudmān mahā ghaṇṭā iti

tathā asmat viśiṣṭānām yoginām nityeṣu tulya ākṛti guṇa kriyeṣu paramāṇuṣu mukta ātma manaḥsu ca anya nimitta asambhava ādyebhyaḥ nimittebhyaḥ pratyādhāram vilakṣaṇaḥ yam vilakṣaṇaḥ yam iti pratyaya vyāvṛttiḥ deśa kāla viprakarṣe ca paramāṇau saḥ eva ayam iti pratyabhijñānam ca bhavati te ntya aviśeṣāḥ
yadi punar antya viśeṣam antareṇa yoginām yoga jāt dharmāt pratyaya vyāvṛttiḥ pratyabhijñānam ca syāt tatas kim syāt na evam bhavati
yathā anayoga jāt dharmāt aśukla śukla pratyayaḥ saṃjāyate atyanta adṛṣṭe ca pratyabhijñānam
yadi syāt mithyā bhavet tathā iha api antya viśeṣam antareṇa yogi nāmnaḥ yoga jāt dharmāt pratyaya vyāvṛttiḥ pratyabhijñānam vā bhavitum arhati
atha antya viśeṣeṣu iva paramāṇuṣu kasmāt na svatas pratyaya vyāvṛttiḥ kalpyate iti ced na tādātmyāt
iha a tad ātmakeṣu anya nimittaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati yathā ghaṭa ādiṣu pradīpāt na tu pradīpe pradīpa antarāt
yathā gavāśva māṃsa ādīnām svatas eva aśuci tvam tad yogāt anyeṣām tathā iha api tādātmyāt antya viśeṣeṣu svatas eva pratyaya vyāvṛttiḥ tad yogāt paramāṇu ādiṣu iti
iti praśasta pāda bhāṣye viśeṣa padārthaḥ samāptaḥ
atha samavāya padārtha nirūpaṇam
ayuta siddhānām ādhārya ādhāra bhūtānām yaḥ sambandha eha pratyaya hetuḥ sa samavāyaḥ

dravya guṇa karma sāmānya viśeṣāṇām kārya kāraṇa bhūtānām akārya kāraṇa bhūtānām vā ayuta siddhānām ādhārya ādhāra bhāvena avasthitānām iha idam iti buddhiḥ yatas bhavati yatas ca a sarva gatānām adhigata anya tvānām aviṣvagbhāvaḥ sa samavāya ākhyaḥ sambandhaḥ

katham yathā iha kuṇḍe dadhi iti pratyayaḥ sambandhe sati dṛṣṭaḥ tathā iha tantuṣu paṭaḥ iha vīraṇeṣu kaṭaḥ iha dravye guṇa kaṃ raṇī iha dravya guṇa karmasu sattā iha dravye dravya tvam iha guṇe guṇa tvam iha karmaṇi karma tvam iha nitya dravye ntyā viśeṣāḥ iti pratyaya darśanāt asti eṣām sambandhaḥ eti jñāyate
na ca asau samyogaḥ sambandhinām ayuta siddha tvāt anyatara karma ādi nimitta asambhavāt vibhāga anta tva adarśanāt adhikaraṇa adhikartavyayoḥ eva bhāvāt iti
saca dravya ādibhyaḥ padārtha antaram bhāvavat lakṣaṇa bhedāt

yathā bhāvasya dravya tva ādīnām sva ādhāreṣu ātma anurūpa pratyaya kartṛ tvāt sva āśraya ādibhyaḥ parasparataḥ ca artha antara bhāvaḥ tathā samavāyasya api pañcasu padārtheṣu iha iti pratyaya darśanāt tebhyaḥ padārtha antara tvam iti
na ca samyogavat nānā tvam bhāvavat liṅga aviśeṣāt viśeṣa liṅga abhāvāt ca tasmāt bhāvavat sarvatra ekaḥ samavāya eti
nanu yadi ekaḥ samavāyaḥ dravya guṇa karmaṇām dravya tva guṇa tva karma tva ādi viśeṣaṇaiḥ saha sambandha ekatvāt padārtha saṅkara prasaṅgaḥ eti na ādhāra ādheya niyamāt
yadi api ekaḥ samavāyaḥ sarvatra svatantraḥ tathā api ādhāra ādheya niyamaḥ usti
katham dravyeṣu eva dravya tvam guṇeṣu eva guṇa tvam karmasu eva karma tvam iti
evamādikasmāt anvaya vyatireka darśanāt
iha iti samavāya nimittasya jñānasya anvaya darśanāt sarvatra ekaḥ samavāyaḥ eti gamyate
dravya tva ādi nimittānām vyatireka darśanāt pratiniyamaḥ jñāyate
yathā kuṇḍa dadhnoḥ samyoga ekatve bhavati āśraya āśrayi bhāva niyamaḥ
tathā dravya tva ādīnām api samavāya eka tve pi vyaṅgya vyaṃjaka śakti bhedāt ādhāra ādheya niyamaḥ eti
sambandha nitya tve pina samyogavat anitya tvam bhāvavat akāraṇa tvāt
yathā pramāṇataḥ kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ nityaḥ bhāvaḥ eti uktam tathā asamavāyaḥ api iti
nahi asya kiñcid kāraṇam pramāṇa tā upalabhyate iti
kayā punar vṛttyā dravya ādiṣu samavāyaḥ vartate
na samyogaḥ sambhavati tasya guṇa tvena dravya āśrita tvāt
na api samavāyaḥ tasya eka tvāt na ca anya avṛttiḥ asti iti na
tādātmyāt
yathā dravya guṇa karmaṇām sat ātmakasya bhāvasya na anyaḥ sattā yogaḥ sti
evam avibhāginaḥ vṛtti ātmakasya samavāyasya na anya avṛttiḥ asti tasmāt sva ātma vṛttiḥ
atas eva atīndriyaḥ sattā ādīnām iva pratyakṣa iṣu vṛtti abhāvāt sva ātma gata saṃvedana abhāvāt ca
tasmāt iha buddhi anumeyaḥ samavāya eti
iti praśasta pāda bhāṣye samavāya padārthaḥ samāptaḥ
yoga ācāra vibhūtyā ayaḥ toṣayitvā maheśvaram
cakre vaiśeṣikam śāstram tasmai kaṇabhuje namaḥ
iti praśasta pāda viracitam dravya ādi ṣaṣ padārtha bhāṣyam samāptam
